sentences.en: a moral obligation to help the poor
sentences.cn: 帮助穷人的道德义务

sentences.en: Co-operation was more than just an attractive option, it was an obligation.
sentences.cn: 合作不仅仅是诱人的选择，它也是一种责任。

sentences.en: Employers have an obligation to treat all employees equally.
sentences.cn: 雇主有责任对所有员工一视同仁。

sentences.en: Every player is under an obligation to keep the rules.
sentences.cn: 每个选手都必须遵守这些规则.

sentences.en: Greater resources are needed to meet these obligations.
sentences.cn: 履行这些义务需要更多的资源。

sentences.en: He stayed with the team out of a sense of obligation.
sentences.cn: 他出于责任感而留在队里。

sentences.en: His commitments to the stepchildren will not reduce his obligation to his natural children.
sentences.cn: 他对继子女的关爱和投入不会减少他对亲生孩子的责任。

sentences.en: I'm morally under obligation to do the best I can by her.
sentences.cn: 我在道义上有责任尽量善待她.

sentences.en: If you are selling your property, why not call us for a free valuation without obligation?
sentences.cn: 如果您打算出售房产，何不打电话让我们作免费估价呢？

sentences.en: It is the obligation of citizens to perform military service.
sentences.cn: 服兵役是每个公民的义务.

sentences.en: Parents are under a legal obligation to educate their children.
sentences.cn: 家长对子女的教育负有法律责任。

sentences.en: She is under an obligation to her adoptive father.
sentences.cn: 她有义务赡养她的养父.

sentences.en: She is under an obligation to her adoptive mother.
sentences.cn: 她有义务赡养她的养母.

sentences.en: The government must pay for health care for war veterans – it is an obligation we owe to them.
sentences.cn: 政府必须为退伍军人支付医疗保健费用——这是我们对他们负有的义务。

sentences.en: The obligation was thrust on him.
sentences.cn: 这责任是强加给他的.

sentences.en: the rights and obligations imposed on them by treaties
sentences.cn: 条约给他们规定的权利和义务

sentences.en: Their frequent invitation places us under an obligation to invite them to our house for a change.
sentences.cn: 他们经常邀请我们,我们只好礼尚往来邀请他们到我们家.

sentences.en: We are all prisoners of our childhood and feel an obligation to it.
sentences.cn: 我们都无法忘记自己的童年时代，觉得仍然为它所缚。

sentences.en: When teachers assign homework, students usually feel an obligation to do it.
sentences.cn: 当老师布置家庭作业的时候，学生们通常觉得做作业是分内之事。

sentences.en: You are under no obligation to buy any more books.
sentences.cn: 你不必非要买更多的书。

sentences.en: You are under no obligation to buy anything.
sentences.cn: 你不必非买什么东西不可。

sentences.en: You can review your policy in detail for a full 15 days without obligation.
sentences.cn: 您可以在15天的免费体验期内仔细审核保单细则。

sentences.en: You're under obligation to care her.
